message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $150 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, I still believe the product is worth more than $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $175. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product. I hope this is within your range and we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still not willing to go as low as $160, but I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $170. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to counter with a price of $165 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can move forward.

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still not willing to go as low as $165, but I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $168. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal carefully, and I would like to counter with a price of $166 for the product. I hope this offer is within your acceptable range and we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate. I've already given you a good deal, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $168 and $166, so I'll offer it to you for $167. This is my last offer.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering your final proposal, I would like to counter with a price of $166.50 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can finalize the transaction.
